name: Before Long
description:
WASD to move

E to inspect

Hold Q for log

W A S or D to exit text

Time passes, people change. Before Long is a short interactive story about a small village, ravaged by time. With so few residents left, and a history full of despair, what are you looking for? Piece together the history of Hendrei Village with hidden clues, and learn about characters who cling to a once lively, but now forgotten home.
